FuncDef:
The recording-scheme command creates a recording scheme and enters the corresponding view.
The undo recording-scheme command deletes a recording scheme that is with no binding.
By default, the device has no recording scheme.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a recording scheme.
It is a case-insensitive string of 1 to 32 characters. The name can not contain such characters as \, /, :, * , ?, ", <, and >.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the recording scheme view, you can configure the HWTACACS server template used in this scheme.
The basic recording policy such as the recording mode must be configured.
